review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
name: babybaby1031
title: It's ok
review: The magnet works well and attracts the individual dots nicely. You can mostly just make patterns so hopefully the user is ok with that. I like that there's a secure piece of plastic over the top so the dots aren't flying everywhere.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
name: Nicholas Cocco
title: This is a great product
review: The material is very sturdy and the magnet works perfectly.It's easy to use and small enough for on the go, or just at home!I recommend this product!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
name: Deana Daellenbach
title: Learning Fun!
review: Educational toy for learning fun. No little pieces to lose and also makes a great travel toy. This appeals to different ages of our grandchildren.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
name: L. Breon
title: Keeps kids engaged!
review: The colored magnets are especially eye-catching and encourage kids to create pictures. Very compact would make good toy for car travel.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
name: Isa Rose
title: Nice size, wish it held the cards
review: This is a really nice size and was perfect for a 3 year old. That being said, I wish it had a way to store and carry the extra cards because right now they’re just loose in a random bag.Other then that, it’s well made and works well. Definitely recommend!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
name: Gabrielle McGhee
title: Fun fun fun
review: was a hit with the kids

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
name: Kk
title: Good idea, but
review: This is not messy except the cards.Not really have spots to put them while traveling.My 3 years old complains that the beads get stuck and then she goes hulk smash to try to get things unstuck.Maybe my kid is not mature enough to play this yet.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
name: Lauren H.
title: Perfect size for the car.
review: I ordered a larger version of this originally but it was much too big for a diaper bag or car toy but this one is perfect.I also like that for my younger child I can slide the card in so he’s just matching the color to a spot as opposed to having to plan and count spaces.You will need to show them how it works and because it’s a clear top, there’s a post in the center they have to drag the dots around. The wells are a little shallow so if you tilt it, the pieces will fall to the bottom. In my opinion, the bottom part should have been just a little bigger to better fit all the pieces.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
name: An Amazon Customer
title: Frustrating!
review: This arrived with a clump of the magnetic "skittles" jammed in the upper corner. Unscrewing the back, adjusting the skittles, making sure they were all uniformly facing metal-dot-side-down, and re-screwing the frame was beyond tedious. Ultimately the effort was worth it and baby loves it, but again, it was a tedious experience and I'm not sure I'd order this again.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
name: SherryB
title: seemed to lose interest fairly quickly
review: It's a good size for travel, doesn't seem like it would break easily, easy to use but didn't seem to hold their interest for long.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
name: Karen
title: Wanted to love it
review: I was really excited to give this to my kids, and it is neat- but the magnets do not rest easily into their spaces to make the pictures.It was frustrating for me, let alone my kids!Neat idea, but bad follow through.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
name: Carrie
title: Great Travel Entertainment
review: This was a great addition to our road trip. It helped keep my girls 2 and 6 entertained while on the road. No pieces to drop or loose which is nice! Easy to use and so many fun designs to make.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
name: Kiki
title: Great road trip distractor!
review: This toy was a life saver on a recent road trip from Minnesota to Texas for a 4 year old! It kept her engaged for longer than most toys! You can use the cards to match the colors, or just play with it without them, andput the colored buttons in any pattern you want! You do have to be careful not to tip it up to far, or all the little magnets will fall.Overall it is a great toy, that teaches patience, thought process, color recognition and more!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
name: SJean9
title: Educational and FUN
review: I absolutely love this! I love that the little magnets are enclosed! We love working on the little patterns! Great product for toddler motor skills!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
name: Linda Huber
title: Great Montessori magnetic board for little ones
review: My son is 4 and loves his new magnetic board. This really helps keep him entertained while at restaurants, or while grocery shopping, etc. he loves sorting the colors, making shapes, and making pictures. It is very good quality. Would make a great gift. Good value for the money.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
name: Danielle Desch
title: Game to keep little hands busy
review: This is a great toy for occupying little ones, especially in the car, plane, restaurant, etc. I like that everything is contained, no loose pieces to worry about. It’s a great toy for teaching fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
name: Customer
title: Cool gift
review: My nephews are addicted to technology and they're only 5 and 2. I thought this would be a great toy to get them off the phones at least for an hour a day. First they couldn't figure out what to do with it. The baby thought it's a tablet and kept tapping it, finally she gave up thinking it's a broken tablet. After they figured it out they loved it for about a day and went back to tablets and phones. No wonder kids have attention span problems they can't play a simple game requiring only attention and imagination. Worth it though. If you want to wean your kids off technology this is a great toy. It's well-made, high-quality materials and will entertain them for hours.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
name: NY2AZ4Lyfe
title: So much fun! Even my 16yo and I play with it!
review: This magnetic drawing board is so much fun! The magnetic pen has a strong magnetic force, as does the beads. The size is great for little ones to carry themselves. I ordered it mainly for when my grandkids visit.I am very picky about what toys I order, that will be staying at my house; due to I only select items I know will really engage them and also that my 16yo and I will enjoy playing with lol.We have mom/daughter nights every week, when my husband is away for work and we order food, binge our favorite shows and play games or with toys. Bringing out our youth nights! We have so much fun and create lasting memories. This drawing board will be a welcomed addition to our nights.I showed it to my 13mo granddaughter on FaceTime last night and she was so intrigued, she kept touching the screen trying to move the magnetic dots. So, I am so excited for the grandkids to play with it!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
name: Ramon
title: great toys
review: these are great toys for forthese kind of children

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
name: London K
title: Great for preschoolers
review: This is great for preschool aged children, allows a good motor skill training and allows them to be artistic! Magnets gave zero problems, they work well.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
name: DameInsane
title: Great for fine motor and cognitive activity!!
review: We love this magnetic activity board! I work in a SNF as a therapist and my patients enjoy copying the patterns (we ended up cutting the pen string for more motion, but I wouldn’t recommend that for using with kids). The beads are easy to move and even easier to clear. A nice workout for the fingers/hands and the brain!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
name: Ekayem
title: Great travel toy
review: A great travel toy for kids.I have a larger one and the grandkids love to play with it.This is a smaller travel size and everything is contained, no lost pieces.I wish there was a place to store the picture cards but it will be a great toy for travel.The cards insert and the child can match the color.Great for younger kids.The pen is attached with a fine coiled cord.Maybe a bit pricey for the toy.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
name: Taqiyya Jackson
title: Best Montessori leaerning pad
review: My daughter loves her Magnetic drawing board! She calls it a “Magic Board”! Best Montessori learning pad!! Soo much better than the IPad. Well great to give toddlers a break from it! Perfect gift for boy or girl!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
name: Valerie
title: So great
review: My daughter loves this! It’s keeps her entertained for long periods of time. The stencils help her with color matching. We’ve even been using it to help with counting as well. The design is very smart because it’s resembles Mickey or Minnie Mouse ears which she loves so made it even more appealing to her. Love that it comes with a handle because we take it with us on the go! It’s def a better option than take her tablet with us everywhere. Very happy with this product!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
name: Kathy Adams
title: Kids like this and it encourages creativity.
review: My five year old grandson likes to play with this. It would be a good toy to keep them busy in the car even though it is a bit large. I recommend this product.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
name: Carol Madruga
title: Great distraction
review: My 2 year old boy loves this thing. We take turns moving pieces and he will play for so long. Comes with different designs to put and be able to mimic.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
name: MCarmer
title: Nice activity for travel
review: This is a nice activity for kids when you are road tripping. Come with lots of design cards to choose from.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
name: Moonlup
title: Comes Assembled and With Lots of Cards to Follow for Pictures.
review: This toy needs to be held relatively horizontal to work but I've found the magnets and colored discs to be very responsive and easy to move around. It comes with a LOT of cards, so many that most don't fit in the slot for storage (I was able to slide in six easily) which means some of the cards may get lost over time. The cards themselves are a thicker cardstock, though I can see them getting ripped if a child is determined. The tablet itself feels really sturdy and I'm glad we won't have to worry about tiny pieces being lost (or swallowed).

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
name: AR
title: Great educational toy
review: This magnetic drawing board is not just a fun toy for my 4 year old but it’s educational as well. Helps him with patience, focus, colors and hand eye coordination.It comes with an attached magnetic pen with magnetic beads sealed inside that are bright and easy to drag into the wells. The board comes with cards that you can slide behind the plastic and make different shapes and patterns to copy or create your own patterns. I Love that it’s mess free, you won’t loose the pieces and it’s safe for my son to use. It’s a great travel toy to bring with you to restaurants or traveling in the car ect.. it also seems like good quality that it’s not coming apart.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
name: Savina
title: Great for car rides
review: This is really nice for car rides.I like that it is magnetic.My kids are enjoying it!It helps them use their imagination, too.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
name: Cindy
title: Fun to Make Pictures! Dots Contained! Pen Securely Attached!
review: Current price $18.59. Love this toy. You get a box that contains magnetic dots. The toy has a pen that has a magnetic head that is secured by a string. You use the pen to move the dots to create pictures. You get cards that have pictures that you can duplicate with the dots and wand. So much fun. I decided to make the bicycle! 4 Stars. Hope you find this review and pictures helpful. My unit arrived a bit scratched on the front. The string was secure and fit nicely in the slot on the top. I love there is a carry handle too. Multiple cards so you can make many different pictures.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
name: On the Spot Massage Academy
title: Not messy but fun
review: Keeps the grandson occupied without making a mess

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
name: William DeBaets
title: Creative Minds
review: This is a fun learning tool for the kids. You can do so much with it from counting to making shapes! Sorting the colors is a fun activity too!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
name: Elle
title: Engaging and fun.
review: The media could not be loaded. This magnetic drawing board help my son to focus and engage a long time using it. Love all the patterns and help him to use his imagination. This is one of the answer to all the mom out there to have a quiet time, screen time out and to entertain your kid to do things by themselves. Because when my kiddo plays with it he can’t stop and took a long time so I can do my choirs and some stuff.
